Package com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorizations

Class InheritableDataGrant

java.lang.Object
com.janeirodigital.sai.core.resources.ReadableResource
com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorizations.ReadableDataGrant
com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorizations.InheritableDataGrant
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllFromRegistryDataGrant, SelectedFromRegistryDataGrant
public abstract class InheritableDataGrant extends ReadableDataGrant
Abstract base class for data grants with scopes that allow inherited children, specifically AllFromRegistryDataGrant and SelectedFromRegistryDataGrant
